description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $971.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Mcdonald Bros Construction. The average
  contract duration was 1.06 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $391.7K. The longest
  contract was 2.19 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.1M.
